channel.title: Client co-ordinate understanding?
channel.description:
Okay, I have absolutely no experience in client-side things so here's my question:
How can I find Co-ordinates for things such as interfaces to input text.
Example: Music tab or Pest Control, writing that would be essential to game-play. Is the Co-ordinates the same as RSBot's mouse Co-ordinates, or is it a specific line of code elsewhere?
